title: (1) The Landshut, Looking Downstream; (2) Kues and the Landshut, Looking Downstream; (3) Kues, Bernkastel and the Landshut, Looking Downstream, plus Detail of the Landshut; (4) Riverbanks near Bernkastel and the Flying Bridge
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
